page.title: 16Roxton Trout Lake
page.content: We went along a dirt track which was marked as gravel pits on the map.These had been transformed into a beautiful trout lake.Two thousand,five hundred fish are stocked in the lake throughout the year.The oldest fish found in the lake was five years old. It weighed 5lb.6oz.There is a fishing club with fifty members which is owned by Mr.Bath(Senior)and his son Mr.Simon Bath.Members are allowed to catch four fish a day and eight per week.The lakes have received an award for land conservation. There were beautiful bushes and trees planted everywhere and sheep were grazing on the surrounding grass.
